product_name: Shimano XT FD-M781 Down-Swing Triple 10-Speed Front Derailleur
long_description: A low-profile derailleur for 3x10 drivetrains, the Shimano XT FD-M781 Down-Swing Triple 10-Speed Front Derailleur offers excellent shifting performance. Angled adjustment screws provide easy access for a screwdriver. Offers increased tire clearance through modified cage tail shape. Also has additional clearance behind the seat tube for mud guard or suspension. Dual-pull cable routing.
short_description: A low-profile derailleur for 3x10 drivetrains, the Shimano XT FD-M781 Down-Swing Triple 10-Speed Front Derailleur offers excellent shifting performance.
